text: Funnily enough, I actually knew about "The Next Pyramid" before I knew this was remixed in Portrait of Ruin. Only because YouTube's autoplay has "In Search of the Secret Spell" as the next video (and my curiosity since Castlevania is one of my all-time favorite game series) did I know it was remixed in Portrait of Ruin.
